summary: A test suite that validates the Vision Transformer detection model's functionality, covering its architecture, configuration handling, initialization, device and storage offloading, parallel execution, and gradient tracking, while adapting generic model tests to the specific input conventions of VitDet.
business_intent: Ensure the VitDet model operates correctly and efficiently in production computerâ€‘vision pipelines, providing confidence in model loading, hardware utilization, and training/inference behavior.
